name: Medal Of Valor 4 WW2 PRO
description:
Answer the call to duty and endure the pacific theater of war in Medal Of Valor 4! Battle using a variety of weapons including those picked up from your enemy! Land on the beaches of Iwo Jima, encounter patrols deep within the jungle and take control of an M4 Sherman tank !

* Intense WW2 combat!
* High quality 3D graphics !
* Realistic weapons !
* Fight alongside allies !
* Take control of an M4 Sherman tank !
